Name: Singel

Name: Singel
Review Text: We've had several delightful experiences at Singel 101 and can highly recommend it! We felt very welcome and had a great experience with amazing food.

Name: Singel
Review Text: Truly excellent food with heart, lovely staff super friendly, we had a wonderful night, thank you so much. We will come back next time we are in Amsterdam.

Name: Singel
Review Text: Mediterranean inspired soulfood that is light and hearty at the same time. Excellent service, wonderful staff, lovely ambience, great value for money.

Name: Singel
Review Text: We came into Singel 101 by chance at 9pm on a Friday (the Thai restaurant we were seeking was closed.) We asked to see a menu and were told there isn‚Äôt one‚Äîjust a 3-course prix fixe.  We rolled the dice and were so thankful that we did.  The food was extraordinary.  Light, creative, and flavorful.  An absolute delight.

Name: Singel
Review Text: What a great experience and joy were having dinner at Singel 101. We are locals and walk the Singel on a daily base. Suddenly in the first week of 2020, we didn‚Äôt have, any of our 5, kids and took the liberty to have dinner. ‚Ä¶

Name: Singel
Review Text: Set menu concept. Feels very homey with the greeter/waiter. Essentially 4 courses for $35 euro, all of which were really good. Started off with bread and a test tube of soup, followed by fish/caviar, followed by really well cooked beef, ‚Ä¶

Name: Singel
Review Text: Always a great experience at Singel101. Julia is a fantastic host, David a great chef. Fantastic food, and with the concept of no menu, always a surprise. Great value for money for both food and wine.

Name: Singel
Review Text: This restaurant exceeded breakfast expectations. Everything was great. They even let us in before openig time because it was raining. The food was fantastic, from the healthy juice, pancake stacks, coffee and that was just my breakfast. Everyone else had something different and it was all tasty. I highly recommend this place.

Name: Singel
Review Text: Fantastic 3- and 4-course menu: affordable and delicious! Loved it

Name: Singel
Review Text: Spent NYE here @ Singel 101.  Very nice servers and good tasting menu.  Both the price for the tasting menus and wine list were reasonable.  Service was a bit slow but it was a full house. You want to make sure you have enough time so you aren‚Äôt worried about the clock.

Name: Singel
Review Text: Amazing food, stuff we would have never tried yet just blew us away. Great wine selection for a moderate budget. Such an awesome spot and the staff are so friendly, the chef is an artist!

Name: Singel
Review Text: The service was awesome and the lady was super friendly. However, regarding the food, it was decent but nothing too special. I wouldn't necessarily recommend this to everyone. The price wasn't cheap or expensive, but I didn't feel like i ‚Ä¶

Name: Singel

Name: Singel
Review Text: A great amalgamy of flavours. Original, surprising, delicious. The lady hosting you makes you feel welcome.
